Text:
在子屏幕上能<1>查看</1>卡组，
或<1>装备</1>卡牌！
OriginalText:
You can <1>VIEW</1> your collection,
 or <1>EQUIP</1> cards on your <1>SUBSCREEN</1>!

Text: 手柄断线了。请重新连线，或点击继续来换成触控控制。
OriginalText: Controller disconnected. Reconnect controller, or tap Continue to switch to touch controls.

Text: 手柄断线了。重新连线来回复游戏。
OriginalText: Controller disconnected. Reconnect controller to resume.
Would you like to go to the shop now?
Would you like to go to the Xbox Games Store now?
Would you like to go to the PlayStation®Store now?

Text: 是否想前往任天堂eShop商店？
OriginalText: Would you like to go to the Nintendo eShop now?

Text: © 2020 WayForward Technologies. Shantae and the Shantae logo ™ Bozon.
OriginalText: © 2020 WayForward Technologies. Shantae and the Shantae logo ™ Bozon.
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Which file would you like to copy?
Which file would you like to erase?
Are you sure you want to erase this file?
Are you sure you want to copy this file?

Text:
无法连线到云服务器
使用本地存档
注意覆盖
OriginalText:
Cannot connect to the cloud server
Using Local Save
Beware of override
Play the game in its original mode!

Text:
您将要游玩香缇与七海妖的第一部分。

在第一部分的结局，您的游戏进度将被保存，以供
在未来免费更新的第二部分中读取。

我们希望您享受香缇与七海妖！
OriginalText:
You are about to enjoy Shantae and the Seven Sirens PART 1.

At the conclusion of PART 1, your game progress will be saved so it can be
loaded into PART 2, which will arrive via a future free update.

We hope you will enjoy Shantae and the Seven Sirens!

Text:
已加载第一部分的游戏进度！

准备好体验香缇与七海妖刺激的结局！
OriginalText:
Your game progress from PART 1 has been loaded!

Get ready for the exciting conclusion to Shantae and the Seven Sirens!

Text:
感谢玩香缇与七海妖第一部分！

您的冒险已存档。可以使用目前的存档继续探索
游戏世界。

收集的任何道具都将能带进未来
免费更新的第二部分。玩得愉快！
OriginalText:
Thank you for playing PART 1 of Shantae and the Seven Sirens!

Your adventure has been saved. You may continue to explore the
game world using the current Save File!

Any new items you collect will be carried over when the
free update containing PART 2 arrives. Enjoy!

Text: 以任何速度集齐所有道具通关
OriginalText: Complete the game with 100% items at any speed.

Text: 以任何速度收集任意数量道具通关
OriginalText: Complete the game with any % items at any speed.

Text: 快速集齐所有道具通关
OriginalText: Complete the game with 100% items at high speed.

Text: 以极快速度集齐所有道具通关
OriginalText: Complete the game at any % at extremely high speed.

Text: 分辨率已保存。需重新启动游戏以使新设定生效。现在重新启动？
OriginalText: Resolution saved. You must restart the game for the settings to take effect. Restart now?

Text: 确定想失去触控控制的改变吗？
OriginalText: Are you sure you want lose changes made to touch controls?

Text: 点击按钮来调整大小，按住并拖动按钮来调整位置。
OriginalText: Tap a button to resize, click and drag the button to adjust the positioning.
Would you like to Save your Progress?

Text:
任何未存档的进度将会消失掉。
确定想退出吗？
OriginalText:
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
 Are you sure you want to quit?

Text: 按下<IB action=PreviousItem scale=0.5f/>或 <IB action=NextItem scale=0.5f/>交换面板。
OriginalText: Press <IB action=PreviousItem scale=0.5f/> or <IB action=NextItem scale=0.5f/> to switch panels

Text: 用 <I anim=ui_game:hud.anb seq=gem scale=0.75f offsety=0.3f offsetx=0.2f width=0.5f/>%03d 买?
OriginalText: Purchase for <I anim=ui_game:hud.anb seq=gem scale=0.75f offsety=0.3f offsetx=0.2f width=0.5f/>%03d ?

Text: 奖励图像～游戏通关，最快时间记录！
OriginalText: Bonus image - Game Clear, Fastest time!

Text: 奖励图像～最快时间记录，百分之百！
奖励图像～百分之百通关！

OriginalText: ALL CLEAR! YOU GET %s BONUS GEMS
You don't have enough gems to continue playing!

Text: 若想看玩法的提示，在存货里点按此项目。
OriginalText: If you ever want a refresher on how to play, tap this item in your inventory.

Text: 目前显示预设控制。控制可以在选项屏幕里定制。
OriginalText: Default controls shown. Controls may be customized in the options screen.

Text: 您在云端和设备上的保存数据不同。
OriginalText: Your save data on the cloud and on your device are different.

Text: 警告：选择一个将会删掉另一个
OriginalText: Warning: Choosing one save will delete the other

Text: 警告：选择本地将会把两个都覆写。选择云来装载而返回首页。
OriginalText: Warning: Select Local to override both. Select Cloud to Load and go back to Title.
...And just like that, the festival was over.

Text: 不久，到了该回家的时间……
OriginalText: Before long, it was time to return home...

Text: 自动吸引附近宝石和心心！
OriginalText: Automatically draws in nearby Gems and Hearts!

Text: 从更远的距离自动吸引附近宝石和心心！
OriginalText: Automatically draws in Gems and Hearts from a greater distance!

Text: 从极远的距离自动吸引附近宝石和心心！
OriginalText: Automatically draws in Gems and Hearts from a significant distance!

Text: 生命耗尽时自动生效的药水！
OriginalText: A potion that kicks in when your Hearts run dry!

Text: 大家最喜爱的疗伤道具的超值包！
OriginalText: A value pack of everyone's favorite healing item!

Text: 快速<1>躲避</1>敌人攻击！按<IB action=Dodge scale=0.5 />冲刺！
OriginalText: Quickly <1>DODGE</1> enemy attacks! Press <IB action=Dodge scale=0.5 /> to dash!

Text: 证明…某某东西的科学证据！
我们也许能从海学到很多呢！
OriginalText: We can learn a lot from the ocean, perhaps!

Text: 亮片大陆最有名的超人布兰松可动玩偶！
OriginalText: An action figure based on Sequin Land's most famous superhero Bran-Son!

Text: 加工食品，能恢复少量健康。
OriginalText: Processed food that restores small amount of health.

Text: 五位必须找到的半精灵名单！仔细找哦！
OriginalText: A list of <1>FIVE HALF-GENIES</1> who must be found! Check everywhere!

Text: 还需跟四位半精灵自我介绍！
OriginalText: Introduce yourself to four more Half-Genie performers!

Text: 还需跟三位半精灵自我介绍！
OriginalText: Introduce yourself to three more Half-Genie performers!

Text: 还需跟两位半精灵自我介绍！
OriginalText: Introduce yourself to two more Half-Genie performers!

Text: 还需跟一位半精灵自我介绍！
OriginalText: Introduce yourself to one more Half-Genie performer!

Text: 护甲男爵送场馆镇市长的礼物！
OriginalText: A gift from the Armor Baron to the mayor of Arena Town!

Text: 成功了！带回给场馆镇市长！
OriginalText: Success! Take it back to Arena Town's Mayor!
Increase the speed of the <1>TRANSFORMATION DANCES</1>!

Text: 得给沉船边的鬼长辈看看！
OriginalText: The Ghost Elder near the sunken ships should see this!

Text:
钻透泥土！
移向<1>软平面</1>来<1>钻</1>！
OriginalText:
Drill through the dirt!
Move against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> to <1>DRILL</1>!

Text:
钻透泥土！
使用<IB action=LSTICK scale=0.75/>移向<1>软平面</1>来<1>钻</1>！
OriginalText:
Drill through the dirt!
Press against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> with <IB action=LSTICK scale=0.75/> to <1>DRILL</1>!

Text: 从半空中下滑屏幕来从天上踩下来。也可以蓄力后释放 <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_attack.anb scale=0.15/>来执行破坏性的<1>旋转冲刺</1>！
OriginalText: Swipe down on the screen in air to STOMP from above. You can also charge up and release <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_attack.anb scale=0.15/> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>!

Text: 从半空中按<IB action=Stomp scale=0.75/>来从天上<1>踩</1>下来。也可以蓄力后释放<IB action=Attack scale=0.75/>来执行破坏性的<1>旋转冲刺</1>！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Stomp scale=0.75/> in air to <1>STOMP</1> from above. You can also charge up and release <IB action=Attack scale=0.75/> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>!

Text: 在海底游泳！按住<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_attack.anb scale=0.15/>以游得更慢！
OriginalText: Swim underwater! Hold <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_attack.anb scale=0.15/> to swim more slowly!

Text: 使用<IB action=LSTICK scale=0.75/>在海底移动！按住<IB action=Attack scale=0.75/>以游得更慢！
OriginalText: Use <IB action=LSTICK scale=0.75/> to move underwater! Hold <IB action=Attack scale=0.75/> to swim more slowly!

Text: 非常受欢迎的宝石，这岛屿的特产！
OriginalText: A highly sought-after gemstone unique to this island!

Text: 把这可怕的娃娃还给鬼长辈。
OriginalText: Return this frightening doll to the Ghost Elder.

Text: 这娃娃的服装暗示它可能来自护甲镇。
OriginalText: This doll's clothes suggest that it's from Armor Town.

Text: 传说食物，能恢复巨量健康。
OriginalText: Legendary food that restores massive amounts of health.

Text: 看起来应该连接着附近什么东西！
OriginalText: Looks like it attaches to something nearby!

Text: 在半空中按<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb scale=0.15/>来<1>二段</1>或<1>三段</1>跳！
OriginalText: Press <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb scale=0.15/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Jump scale=0.75/>来<1>二段</1>或<1>三段</1>跳！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Jump scale=0.75/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump!

Text: 方便的药水，恢复<1>生命值</1>!
OriginalText: Refill your <1>HEARTS</1> with this handy potion!
A money-saving value pack of Potions!

Text: 带它去你附近的<1>鱿鱼匠</1>!

OriginalText: Some kind of instructional manual. Useless.

Text: 减少百分之二十五伤害的护甲喷雾！
OriginalText: Spray-on armor that lowers the amount of damage taken by 25%!
Return this to the friendly doggo!
Plink is waiting backstage for one of these!

Text: 方便的药水，恢复<1>魔法值</1>!
OriginalText: Refill your <1>MAGIC METER</1> with this handy potion!
Save your gems! Buy in volume!

Text: 手工制软娃娃，上面有扣子。
OriginalText: A soft, hand made doll with buttons on it.
A map to the current location!
Wasn't <1>VERA</1> asking about something like this?

Text: 带<1>六颗贝壳</1>给科学家！还需要五颗！
OriginalText: Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 5 more!

Text: 带<1>六颗贝壳</1>给科学家！还需要四颗！
OriginalText: Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 4 more!

Text: 带<1>六颗贝壳</1>给科学家！还需要三颗！
OriginalText: Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 3 more!

Text: 带<1>六颗贝壳</1>给科学家！还需要两颗！
OriginalText: Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 2 more!

Text: 带<1>六颗贝壳</1>给科学家！还需要一颗！
OriginalText: Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 1 more!

Text: 你找到全部<1>六颗贝壳</1>了！带去给科学家！
OriginalText: You found all <1>SIX SHELLS</1>! Take them to the scientist!

Text:
变成水蜥来冲刺和爬墙！
在空中按<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb scale=0.25/>来<1>冲刺</1>。
OriginalText:
Dash and climb walls as a newt!
Press <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb scale=0.25/> in air to <1>DASH</1>.

Text:
变成水蜥来冲刺和爬墙！
在空中按<IB action=Dash scale=0.75/>来<1>冲刺</1>。
OriginalText:
Dash and climb walls as a newt!
Press <IB action=Dash scale=0.75/> in air to <1>DASH</1>.

Text: 只有传说之勇者能集齐<1>三颗聋珠</1>！专利申请中。
OriginalText: Only the Champ of Legend can find all <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1>! Patent pending.

Text: 能恢复健康的美味食物。
给护甲男爵的金属矿石！他需要三块。
OriginalText: Metal Ore for the Armor Baron! He needs three of these.

Text: 精心料理的食物，恢复大量健康。
OriginalText: Well-prepared food that restores a good amount of health.
Increase the <1>DAMAGE DEALT</1> by your hair!
Increase the <1>DAMAGE DEALT</1> by your hair!
Increase the <1>DAMAGE DEALT</1> by your hair!

Text: 把它带去控制室。鬼狗知道路！
OriginalText: Take this to the Control Room. Ghost Dog knows the way!

Text: 香气扑鼻，能恢复大量健康。
OriginalText: Tangy food that restores a lot of health.

Text: 备件，能拿来修理故障的电器。
OriginalText: Spare parts that can be used to repair a broken electric machine.
Return this to the friendly doggo!

Text: 能恢复不少健康的烤水果。
OriginalText: Roasted fruit that restores a fair amount of health.
The words WEST HATCH are inscribed on it.

Text: 能恢复极多健康的美味佳肴。
OriginalText: Expertly-prepared food that restores a ton of health.
Increase the <1>WHIPPING SPEED</1> of your hair!
Increase the <1>WHIPPING SPEED</1> of your hair!
Increase the <1>WHIPPING SPEED</1> of your hair!

Text: 把这些带回去给城镇里的鱿鱼匠！
OriginalText: Take these to the Squidsmith back in town!

Text: 恢复<1>生命和魔法值</1>！真划算！
OriginalText: Refills <1>HEARTS AND MAGIC</1>! What a deal!

Text: 批量购买！恢复生命和魔法值，屯屯屯！
OriginalText: Buy in bulk! Refill Hearts and Magic with one gulp!

Text: 被踩过的烤脆面包。波罗的最爱。
OriginalText: Crunchy toast that's been stepped on. Bolo's favorite.

Text: 某种能源导体。但目前没电。
OriginalText: Some kind of energy conductor. But it's out of power.

Text: 掉进洞时不受任何损害！
OriginalText: Take no damage when destroyed by a pit!
Take zero damage when destroyed by spikes!

Text: 甩头发攻击造成更多伤害！
OriginalText: Hair Whip attack deals even more damage than before!

Text: 减少从敌人攻击受到的伤害！
OriginalText: Reduce the amount of damage taken from enemy attacks!
The Magic Meter will refill over time!

Text: 增加所有食物恢复的生命！
OriginalText: All food types gain an extra healing boost when consumed!

Text: 从更远的距离自动吸引宝物！
OriginalText: Loot will be automatically drawn in from a greater distance!

Text: 使用水蜥冲刺时造成更大伤害！
OriginalText: Inflict even more damage when using the Newt Dash!

Text: 增加水蜥冲刺能飞的距离！
OriginalText: Extend the reach of the Newt Dash and fly further!

Text: 以极快的速度进行水蜥冲刺！
OriginalText: The Newt travels at super speed when dashing!

Text: 水蜥形态时更快地攀上墙壁！
OriginalText: Zip up walls with reckless abandon as the Newt!

Text: 比之前更快地钻透泥土！
OriginalText: Drill through dirt much faster than before!

Text: 乌龟冲撞攻击造成更多伤害！
OriginalText: The Tortoise's Bash attack causes higher damage than before!

Text: 使用乌龟踩攻击时给敌人造成更大伤害！
OriginalText: Deal more damage to foes using super powerful Tortoise Stomps!
The Tortoise Form will take less time to charge up!

Text: 减少扫描舞消耗的魔法！
OriginalText: The Seer Dance consumes less magic when used!

Text: 减少恢复舞消耗的魔法！
OriginalText: The Refresh Dance consumes less magic when used!

Text: 增加恢复舞恢复的生命！
OriginalText: The Refresh Dance restores more Empty Hearts than before!

Text: 增加恢复舞给病弱与不死族敌人的伤害！
OriginalText: The Refresh Dance does more damage to sickly or undead foes!

Text: 减少火花舞消耗的魔法！
OriginalText: The Spark Dance consumes less magic when used!

Text: 增加火花舞给敌人的伤害！
OriginalText: The Spark Dance does more damage to foes!

Text: 减少震撼舞消耗的魔法！
OriginalText: The Quake Dance consumes less magic when used!

Text: 增加震撼舞给敌人的伤害！
OriginalText: The Quake Dance does more damage to foes!

Text: 增加火箭给敌人的伤害！
OriginalText: Rockets inflict more damage to their targets!

Text: 加快火箭追赶目标的速度！
OriginalText: Rockets travel much faster when chasing down their targets!
Rockets consumes less magic when used!
Increase the damage dealt by the bouncing Super Ball weapon!
The Super Ball travels much faster than before!
The Super Ball consumes less magic when used!
Increase the damage caused by Fireball magic!
Fireballs consume less magic when used!
The Shield consumes less magic when used!
The Boomerang does more damage than before!
Boomerangs are thrown with tremendous speed!

Text: 减少回力镖消耗的魔法！
OriginalText: The Boomerang consumes less magic when used!

Text: 增加尖球武器给敌人造成的伤害！
OriginalText: The Pike Ball weapon class deals even more damage to foes!
The Pike Ball consumes less magic when used!
Increase the odds of collecting dropped Hearts!
Increase the odds of collecting dropped Food!
Increase the number of dropped Gems!

Text: 增加从打倒的敌人身上获得魔法的几率！
OriginalText: Increase the odds of collecting dropped Magic!

Text: 在任何商店获得折扣价。
OriginalText: Get reduced prices at any Item Shop!

Text: 获得能打碎蝎钳怪外壳的力量！
OriginalText: Gain Shell-cracking strength that can defeat even Pincher monsters!
Automatically break jugs by walking into them!

Text: 甩头发把红宝石转换成心心！
OriginalText: Use your Hair Whip to convert Red Gems into Hearts!

Text: 甩头发把绿宝石转换成魔力！
OriginalText: Use your Hair Whip to convert Green Gems into Magic!
This card can't be identified at this time!

Text: 此卡片的能力仍然是个谜！
OriginalText: This card's abilities remain a mystery!

Text: 这神秘的舞蹈能显示肉眼看不见的东西！到处试试看看！
OriginalText: This mysterious dance can reveal things that are hidden from the naked eye! Try using it in a variety of places!

Text: 自然的力量可以恢复疲劳和治疗疾病，同时填补空洞的心！
OriginalText: The power of nature can revive the weary and heal the sick - and restore Empty Hearts in the process!

Text: 召唤出地动山摇的地震！此舞伤害巨大，甚至能更改周围的环境…
OriginalText: Shake things up by calling forth powerful tremors! This dance deals heavy damage, and can even alter your surroundings...

Text: 使用电击舞电击敌人。也可能影响到其他物体…
OriginalText: Shock your foes with the power of this electrical dance. It may affect other objects as well...

Text: 使用<1>泡泡</1>盾防御敌人的子弹！
OriginalText: Protect yourself from enemy projectiles with a <1>BUBBLE</1> shield!

Text: 用<1>魔法</1>从<1>远距离</1>烤熟敌人！
OriginalText: Spend <1>MAGIC</1> to roast your foes from <1>LONG RANGE</1>!

Text: 使用重型<1>火力</1>把敌人<1>烤焦</1>！会消耗<1>魔法值</1>。
OriginalText: Bring on the <1>SIZZLE</1> with heavy duty <1>FIREPOWER</1>! Consumes <1>MAGIC</1>.

Text: 环绕着保护你的<1>球</1>！会消耗<1>魔法值</1>。
OriginalText: An <1>ORBITING BALL</1> protects your bod! Consumes <1>MAGIC</1>.

Text: 环绕着你的三个<1>铁球</1>！会消耗<1>魔法值</1>。
OriginalText: Three <1>STEEL BALLS</1> orbit your body! Uses <1>MAGIC</1>.

Text: 比之前<1>火球</1>覆盖面更广！会消耗<1>魔法值</1>。
OriginalText: Even more <1>FIREBALL</1> coverage than before! Consumes <1>MAGIC</1>.

Text: 使用环绕<1>弯刀</1>的神奇力量武装自己！
OriginalText: Arm yourself with the mystical power of orbiting <1>SCIMITAR</1> blades!

Text: 使用这强力的盾防御攻击！
OriginalText: Repel attacks with this powerful shield!

Text: 完全无敌，摆脱敌人攻击！
OriginalText: Shrug off enemy attacks with total invincibility!

Text: 发射弹力球，从刁钻的角度打击敌人！啵嘤！
OriginalText: Launch a bouncing projectile to hit foes at awkward angles! Boing!
Throw two of these powerful, rebounding balls at a time!

Text: 一次丢三个弹力球！让敌人无处可逃！
OriginalText: Throw three bouncing balls! Enemies, there's no escape!

Text: 发射自动追踪目标的致命火箭！
OriginalText: Fire deadly projectiles that seek out targets on their own!

Text: 增加这热导武器的数量、速度和伤害！
OriginalText: Increase the number, speed, and damage of these heat-seeking beauties!

Text: 最大化火箭的速度和伤害！
OriginalText: Max out your rockets with top tier speed and damage!

Text: 丢出会飞回的木头飞镖！
OriginalText: Cast a wooden projectile that always comes back!
Cast two Boomerangs at a time, in a wide array.
